1666140.name: Crafting Table - Minecraft Tools
1666140.description:
What is this?
Crafting Table - Minecraft Tools is an application created by Varstep Studios that allows you to manage Minecraft game resources dynamically (as mods, shaderpacks, resource packs, etc.), make your own server and much more.

What we offer:
- Upload resource files directly into .minecraft folder;
- Install Forge, Fabric and Optifine;
- Make your own Spigot Server fully set (1 server slot available at the moment);
- Install and manage plugins;
